title: How is deception used in Much Ado About Nothing? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s basically the basis for the whole plot: the prince and his men decide to orchestra a match between Benedict and Beatrice using only deception as a means to a happy end. While the prince’s brother uses deception to break up an already established couple for no other reason than to creature disruption and chaos. So everyone is using deception to achieve their ends; the good people for good reasons and the bad for bad reasons.
